job_tasks.phrase: As you work on Projects / Products you are expected to learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the need to understand business concepts related to the projects, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: building Software Solutions to enable our internal and external clients
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the core activity of creating software solutions, which falls under Software Development.
This further reinforces the focus on creating specific software solutions, directly relating to Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Building web applications or work on Data Analysis projects
job_tasks.justification: Building web applications is a clear indicator of Software Development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Working on Internal tool development and external client projects
job_tasks.justification: The development of tools and projects for clients aligns with Software Development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Working as part of Agile development teams
job_tasks.justification: Working within Agile development teams is a common practice in Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Learning and using Git for version control
job_tasks.justification: Git is a fundamental tool for version control in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Completing the documentation tasks as expected by the Project/Product team
job_tasks.justification: Documentation is an integral part of the Software Development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: make optimal use of technology during these complex processes (e.g. during an IPO, merger or acquisition)
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding business processes and applying technology to them.

job_tasks.phrase: work on Data Analysis projects using Python (FastAPI, Django), Javascript (React) and SQL and NoSQL
job_tasks.justification: While focused on analysis, working with data, databases (SQL/NoSQL), and data processing languages points to data-related tasks, which can overlap with Data Engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: continuously invest globally in the development of our team members, our skills and the innovative tools that we use
Learning and using Git for version control
As you work on Projects / Products you are expected to learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product
Motivated to complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time.
work with in multidisciplinary teams (including deals & technical accounting experts, ERP & technology specialists, software developers and data analysts)
Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development of various consulting skills.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks, including building web applications and using common development tools like Git. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related specialized techniques, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
